Tournaments

Nebula eSports

INFO

Our rainbow six siege team competes in the following tournaments listed below. To find out more feel free to reach out to one of our community representatives or to schedule a scrim please head over to the contacts page.

UK Premiership

We're currently aiming to win qualifiers and head into the premiership UK scene with a Â£10,500 prize pool up for grabs. Wish us luck! follow us on twitter, @NebulaESL to help support the team. We hope to see you out there!

IGL

IGL is a community run competitive cup boasting 4 successful North American seasons. We're currently blazing a path through IGL's first ever European season headed towards our prize.
